snippet: The latest installment of The Times's series "The Hard Road Back," by the At War editor James Dao, profiles the family of Lt. Col. Paul J. Finken, who was killed in Iraq six years ago by a roadside bomb on the final patrol of his yearlong deployment.
abstract: The latest installment of The Times's series "The Hard Road Back," by the At War editor James Dao, profiles the family of Lt. Col. Paul J. Finken, who was killed in Iraq six years ago by a roadside bomb on the final patrol of his yearlong deployment.

headline.main: The Hard Road Back: A Family Mourns While Moving Forward

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
